Rationale: High frequency and/or significant IR improvement
Recommendation: Always remove Prepositions / Relational Words. These words contribute significant noise with minimal semantic value.

Rationale: High frequency and/or significant IR improvement
Recommendation: Always remove Conjunctions. These words contribute significant noise with minimal semantic value.

Rationale: Moderate frequency and/or moderate IR improvement
Recommendation: Remove Auxiliary Verbs / Aspect Markers for most applications. Provides good noise reduction with minimal information loss.

Rationale: Moderate frequency and/or moderate IR improvement
Recommendation: Remove Function Nouns for most applications. Provides good noise reduction with minimal information loss.

Rationale: Moderate frequency and/or moderate IR improvement
Recommendation: Remove Determiners & Quantifiers for most applications. Provides good noise reduction with minimal information loss.

Rationale: Moderate frequency and/or moderate IR improvement
Recommendation: Remove Particles & Discourse Markers for most applications. Provides good noise reduction with minimal information loss.

Rationale: Low frequency, removal may be context-dependent
Recommendation: Consider removing Pronouns based on specific application. May contain useful information for some tasks.

Rationale: Low frequency, removal may be context-dependent
Recommendation: Consider removing Numbers & Time Expressions based on specific application. May contain useful information for some tasks.

Rationale: Low frequency, minimal impact on IR
Recommendation: Keep Question & Negation Words unless specifically targeting noise reduction. Contains potentially useful information.

Rationale: Low frequency, minimal impact on IR
Recommendation: Keep Politeness & Honorifics unless specifically targeting noise reduction. Contains potentially useful information.
